articles.title: United Rugby Championship organisers confirm European clubs heading for SA shores - News24
articles.description: Tournament organisers have confirmed new dates and venues for the United Rugby Championship encounters that were postponed due to Covid-19 late last year.
articles.content:
• The United Rugby Championship encounters that were postponed due to Covid-19 late last year have been rescheduled.
  • Scarlets, Munster, Cardiff and Zebre Parma will visit South Africa i… [+3209 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Morrison
articles.title: Amazing animation shows how a small NASA rocket will lift off from the surface of Mars - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Mars Sample Return mission is a joint project of NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA), which is building a small 'fetch' rover to gather the collected samples.
articles.content:
In 2028, a NASA rocket will lift off, taking a payload of rocks into orbit and sending them on a 40 million-mile journey - from Mars to Earth.
It will be the first time a rocket has lifted off from … [+7489 chars]
